pages.text: The $(item)Scrap Bin$() is useful for recycling items/blocks you may have great quantities of. If more than a stack of any particular item is inserted to it, the amount over a single stack will be destroyed, and value added to the scrap bin.

With enough scrap value, a scrap bin will generate a $(item)Scrap Bag$() which may be opened for an assortment of useful (or not!) stuff. However, opening the bag gives you a lingering smell that must be washed off using$(item)Soap$() before villagers will trade with you.
